ToolHeader.title: Kamera Yozuvchi
ToolHeader.description: Kamerangizni sinab ko'ring, video yozing va screenshot oling

placeholder.title: Kamerani yoqish uchun yuqoridagi tugmani bosing
placeholder.subtitle: Avval ruxsat berishingiz kerak

recording.format: Recording to WebM format with audio

useCases.title: Asosiy foydalanish joylari:
useCases.contentCreation: Content Creation: Blog, video kontent va ijtimoiy media uchun
useCases.documentation: Documentation: Layihalar va jarayonlar uchun video hujjatlar
useCases.education: Education: Ta'lim va o'qitish materiallari yaratish
useCases.testing: Testing: Kamera va mikrofon funksionalligini tekshirish
useCases.qualityControl: Quality Control: Turli qurilmalarda video sifatini baholash

tips.title: Professional maslahatlar:
tips.microphone: Mikrofon yaqin bo'lishi uchun kameraga yaqinroq o'tiring
tips.quality: HD yoki Full HD sifatni tanlang, lekin internet tezligini hisobga oling
tips.screenshot: Screenshot olishdan oldin video ni pauza qiling

note.title: Eslatma:
note.content: Video va audio fayllar avtomatik WebM formatida saqlanadi. Bu format zamonaviy brauzerlarda yaxshi qo'llab-quvvatlanadi va yuqori sifat bilan kichik hajmga ega.
